text: Dick Tracy is a 1990 action movie. This movie was based on the 1930s character of the same name. The movie is about mobsters and street gangs. Warren Beatty plays the title character. Madonna plays Breathless Mahoney and Glenne Headly plays Tess Trueheart. Beatty also directed and produced Dick Tracy. This movie got mixed reviews from the critics. It was, however, a box office success. It received three Academy Awards. A video game based on the movie was released for the Nintendo Entertainment System in August 1990. == Other websites == * Category:1990 action movies Category:1990 movies
title: Dick Tracy (movie)
